configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[{"customLinkFilterRegex":"\\/readtemplate\\?(?:[^#&]*&)*lang\\=zh_CN&(?:[^#&]*&)*t\\=page\\/faq\\/android\\/[0-9]{3,}\\/index&(?:[^#&]*&)*faq\\=android_[0-9]{3,}(?:[&#].*)?$","autoApkFilterByArch":false,"filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":true,"reverseSort":true,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false}],"customLinkFilterRegex":"","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"requestHeader":[{"requestHeader":"User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"partialAPKHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\/weixin(?:(?:([0-9])([0-9])([0-9]))|(?:([0-9]+)([0-9])([0-9]{2})))android.*\\.apk$","matchGroupToUse":"$1$4.$2$5.$3$6","versionDetection":true,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"arm64","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":false,"appName":"Weixin","appAuthor":"Tencent","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"Connecting a billion people with calls, chats, and more","refreshBeforeDownload":false}

configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"Connecting a billion people with calls, chats, and more","apkFilterRegEx":"\\/(?:.+_)?arm64(?:_.+)?\\.apk$","appName":"Weixin","autoApkFilterByArch":false,"intermediateLink":[{"customLinkFilterRegex":"\\/readtemplate\\?(?:[^#&]*&)*lang\\=zh_CN&(?:[^#&]*&)*t\\=page\\/faq\\/android\\/[0-9]{3,}\\/index&(?:[^#&]*&)*faq\\=android_[0-9]{3,}(?:[&#].*)?$","filterByLinkText":false,"reverseSort":true,"skipSort":true}],"invertAPKFilter":true,"matchGroupToUse":"$1$4.$2$5.$3$6","trackOnly":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":true,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\/weixin(?:(?:([0-9])([0-9])([0-9]))|(?:([0-9]+)([0-9])([0-9]{2})))android.*\\.apk$"}
